BRANDING_CARE_TITLE: We always care about everything new

BLOG.TITLE_ONE: Corporate power with digital presence in Saudi Arabia
BLOG.PARAGRAPH_ONE: The Kingdom of Saudi Arabia has taken quantum leaps to accelerate digital transformation to achieve the Kingdom's 2030 vision for an ambitious homeland with a vibrant society and prosperous economy. With the aim of reaching an information society and a digital economy, to be a digital model that achieves economic sustainability and global leadership, and improves the quality of life.
BLOG.TITLE_TWO: Analyze social media data and its relationship with competitors
BLOG.PARAGRAPH_TWO: Over the past years, social media has become an essential component of digital marketing, as it gives companies an opportunity to get to know and communicate with target customers. It is also an opportunity to learn about all competitors' activities. Hence the importance of monitoring and analyzing social media sites continuously to exploit this marketing power for the benefit of your company in an effective way.
BLOG.TITLE_THREE: Coronavirus and the impact of global epidemics on brands
BLOG.PARAGRAPH_THREE: At the time of writing, the Coronavirus, known as Covid-19, is present in more than 71 countries around the world. The World Health Organization has been reluctant to describe the spread of Covid-19 as a pandemic, after the violent reaction to the outbreak of SARS in 2009. Nevertheless, many experts point out that it is now entering areas that most of us would agree as 'epidemic ratios.'
BLOG.TITLE_FOUR: How to make sure your brand is safe from the Coronavirus
BLOG.PARAGRAPH_FOUR: Harvard Business Review explains that the decisions you have to make as a brand to survive the Coronavirus are to do business anyway. There will always be external and global influences around to be prepared for.
BLOG.TITLE_FIVE: The future of e-commerce with covid-19
BLOG.PARAGRAPH_FIVE: With the spread of the Coronavirus, Covid-19, and the consequent precautionary and preventive measures, and calls for social distancing, customers have turned towards electronic shopping sites away from gatherings for fear of infection.
BLOG.TITLE_SIX: The digital economy in Saudi Arabia
BLOG.PARAGRAPH_SIX: The tremendous advancement of information technology has led to fundamental changes in lifestyles in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. As this progress led to a radical change in the methods and means of implementing economic activities, and produced a new type of economy known as the digital economy, and its positive impact was reflected on society in general, as the transformation to the digital economy is sufficient to change and achieve new events that positively affect the economic interests of the Kingdom.
